page.title: 18JAIL LANE SQUASH CLUB
page.content:
PLAYING SQUASH IN BIGGIN HILL
The squash club is in a large square building in Jail Lane almost oposite Charles Darwin School. 300 people are members of the club, some are full playing members and others are just social members. Ther are two squash courts that spectators can look into. there are two changing rooms and they have showers and toilets. The club serves snacks like peanuts, crisps and coke, and it does cater for parties. Pets are not allowed inside in case they do something naughty. On Wednesdays, a group of mothers bring their young children. As the mothers play squash, some of the club's staff look after the babies. The club has its own car park. squash is a popular form of recreation.
